description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters Author: Florian Roth (rule). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious PowerShell Invocations - Generic
query: (powershell.file.script_block_text:(*\ \-enc\ * OR *\ \-EncodedCommand\ *) AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*\ \-w\ hidden\ * OR *\ \-window\ hidden\ * OR *\ \-windowstyle\ hidden\ *) AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*\ \-noni\ * OR *\ \-noninteractive\ *))
